abstract.text: Retrieves the final layout information for a supplementary view that is about to be removed from the collection view.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: A string that identifies the type of supplementary view.
The index path of the view being deleted.
A layout attributes object that describes the position of the supplementary view to use as the end point for animating its removal.
This method is called after the

method for any supplementary views that are about to be deleted. Your implementation should return the layout information that describes the final position and state of the view. The collection view uses this information as the end point for any animations. (The starting point of the animation is the viewâ€™s current location.) If you return
, the layout object uses the same attributes for both the start and end points of the animation.
The default implementation of this method returns

abstract.text: Construct and manage a graphical, event-driven user interface for your iOS, iPadOS, or tvOS app.
An abstract base class for generating layout information for a collection view.
Retrieves the final layout information for a decoration view that is about to be removed from the collection view.
Retrieves the final layout information for an item that is about to be removed from the collection view.
Retrieves the final layout information for a supplementary view that is about to be removed from the collection view.
Performs any additional animations or clean up needed during a collection view update.
Retrieves an array of index paths representing the decoration views to remove.
Retrieves an array of index paths representing the supplementary views to remove.
Retrieves an array of index paths representing the decoration views to add.
Retrieves an array of index paths for the supplementary views you want to add to the layout.
Retrieves the starting layout information for a decoration view being inserted into the collection view.
Retrieves the starting layout information for an item being inserted into the collection view.
Retrieves the starting layout information for a supplementary view being inserted into the collection view.
Notifies the layout object that the contents of the collection view are about to change.
Retrieves the index path to for an item when it is at the specified location in the collection viewâ€™s bounds.
A layout object that manages the layout-related attributes for a given item in a collection view.
An object containing a list of indexes that bridges to ; use  when you need reference semantics or other Foundation-specific behavior.
A static, plain-text Unicode string object which you use when you need reference semantics or other Foundation-specific behavior.
A list of indexes that together represent the path to a specific location in a tree of nested arrays.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
A singleton actor whose executor is equivalent to the main dispatch queue.

inlineContent.text: A string that identifies the type of supplementary view.
The index path of the view being deleted.
A layout attributes object that describes the position of the supplementary view to use as the end point for animating its removal.
